column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Before you order the pizza they always warn you that it'll take around 40 minutes for a pizza. Even though the wait for the pizza was long
column2: every single minute was worth it. The cheese and the flavor was just on point! My favorite part was the crust(me being a crust guy!). The bread was not burnt neither undercooked. It was just crunchy and chewy at the same time. I would recommend this place to tourists who are visiting chicago that wants to taste the classic thick deep dish pizza from Chicago!
